Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.modelview

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.modelview.GameView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Singleton class that is the view equivalent of the Game class. Holds the markets' views, the players' views and the value of Lorenzo's black cross.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int blackCross
    Value of Lorenzo's faith track for solo games.
    private PlayerView currentPlayer
    The view of the player playing their turn.

    Development cards market of the game.
    private MarketView marketInstance
    Market view of the game
    private static GameView singleton  
    private java.util.Map<User,​PlayerView> userPlayerHashMap
    List mapping users to their view.
